mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE ((SELECT DISTINCT 1 FROM TB_USER WHERE NICKNAME=#{nickname} LIMIT 1), 0)
SELECT COALESCE ((SELECT DISTINCT 1 FROM TB_USER WHERE EMAIL=#{email} LIMIT 1), 0)
SELECT COALESCE ((SELECT DISTINCT 1 FROM TB_USER WHERE PHONE=#{phone} LIMIT 1), 0)
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_USER (EMAIL, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, LOGIN_TYPE, USER_LEVEL, PROFILE_IMAGE, PHONE, INSERT_DATE) VALUES ( #{email}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{loginType}, #{userLevel}, #{profileImage}, #{phone}, now());
